SA01mkarmviu:337_9: mānuṣyaṃ strībhāvam atikrāntaṃ divyaṃ rūpaṃ prādurbhūtam. tadviṣayaprativāsinā ca
SA01mkarmviu:337_10: rājñāgradevī sthāpitā. kālagatā deveṣūpapannā. paścime 'pi ca bhave campāyām agrakulikasya (MKV 100)
SA01mkarmviu:338_0: duhitā pratyājātā paramakalyāṇī sauvarṇā cāsyā mālā sarvaratnamaṇḍitā śirasi sahasaiva
SA01mkarmviu:338_1: prādurbhūtā. mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vismayajātābhyāṃ mālinīty evāsyā nāma kṛtam. yadā ca bhagavān
SA01mkarmviu:338_2: abhisaṃbuddho rājagṛhāc campām anuprāptaḥ. sā copasaṃkrāntā. tasyāś ca bhagavatā
SA01mkarmviu:338_3: dharmadeśanā kṛtā pravrajitā cārhantī saṃvṛttā. sāha cittotpādād evāsyā mā me bhūyo
SA01mkarmviu:338_4: mālā bhavatv ity antarhitā. tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vismayaprāptā devatā gāthām anugāyate yathāha.
SA01mkarmviu:339: dattvā tu palālamayīṃ mālāṃ sā mālinī sugatasya caitye
SA01mkarmviu:342_0: LXXIV. katame daśa guṇā muktapuṣpapradānasya. ucyate. puṣpabhūto bhavati lokasya.
SA01mkarmviu:342_1: ghrāṇendriyaṃ viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyaṃ samapaiti. saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:342_2: daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ khyātiṃ gacchati. abhigamanīyaś ca bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati (MKV 101)
SA01mkarmviu:343: iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
SA01mkarmviu:344: a) atra karṇesumanasya pūrvajanmani prasāde jāte ekaikapuṣpapradānasya vipāko vaktavyaḥ. yathā sa eva āha.
SA01mkarmviu:348_0: LXXV. katame daśa guṇā dīpapradānasya. ucyate. pradīpabhūto bhavati lokasya. māṃsacakṣur
SA01mkarmviu:348_1: naśyati. divyacakṣuḥ prādurbhavati. avidyāndhakāraṃ vidhamati. jñānāloka utpadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:348_2: kuśalākuśalān dharmān kṣipraṃ prajñayā pratividhyati. saṃsāre saṃsarato 'vidyāndhakāro
SA01mkarmviu:348_3: na bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
SA01mkarmviu:350_0: a) yathā coktam abhidharme cakravartisūtravibhaṅge. kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī
SA01mkarmviu:350_1: maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhate. dīrgharātraṃ rājñā cakravartinā dīpapradānāni pradattāni.
SA01mkarmviu:350_2: pradīpaikadānāni ca. andhakāre ratnapradīpā dhāritā. ye cakṣuṣmantas te samaviṣamāṇi
SA01mkarmviu:359_0: atrāryāniruddhasya dīpe divyacakṣur ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cakṣūtpāṭanamokṣāyaṇe vaktavyam. yathā
SA01mkarmviu:359_1: dīpamālāpradānena dīpaṅkareṇa buddhatvaṃ prāptam. yā ca śrāvastyāṃ cakṣuvikalena
SA01mkarmviu:359_2: pradīpamālā kāritā. saprasādo jātaḥ. praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān. utthitasya cāsya yathā
SA01mkarmviu:359_3: paurāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃvṛttam. ime daśa guṇā dīpapradānasya.
SA01mkarmviu:361_0: LXXVI. katame daśa guṇā gandhapradānasya. ucyate. gandhabhūto bhavati lokasya. ghrāṇendriyaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:361_1: viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyam apaiti. saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati. daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:361_2: pravāti. abhigamanīyo bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca
SA01mkarmviu:362_0: a) yathoktam abhidharme cakravartisūtre. kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:362_1: strīratnasya romakūpebhyaḥ śarīrād gandho nirgacchati. tadyathā gandhasamudgakasya.
SA01mkarmviu:362_2: dīrgharātraṃ tayā striyā caityagarbhagṛheṣu gandhopalepanāni dattāni. surabhīṇi ca
SA01mkarmviu:362_3: puṣpāṇi dhūpaś ca dattāḥ. stūpeṣu ca gandhasnāpanāni kṛtāni. tasya karmaṇo vipākena
SA01mkarmviu:362_4: rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya śarīrād evaṃrūpo gandho nirgacchati. tadyathā gandhakaraṇḍasya.
SA01mkarmviu:364_0: LXXVII. katame daśa guṇāḥ pravrajyāyāḥ. ucyate. putrabhāryaduhitṛdhanatṛṣṇāsya na
SA01mkarmviu:364_1: bhavati. kāmasya parigraho na bhavati. araṇyavāse prītiṃ pratilabhate. buddhagocaraṃ
SA01mkarmviu:364_2: sevate. bālagocaraṃ vivarjayati. durgatigamanīyān dharmān vivarjayati. sugatigamanīyān
SA01mkarmviu:364_3: dharmān sevate. devā asya spṛhayanti. nityaṃ sugatavacane pravrajyāṃ pratilabhate.
SA01mkarmviu:365_0: LXXVIII. katame daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya. ucyate. saṃgaṇikā vivarjayati. pravivekaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:365_1: sevate. dhyānālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati. na ca bahukarmakṛtyatāṃ prāpnoti. buddhānāṃ
SA01mkarmviu:365_2: smṛtiṃ yāti. prītisukhasaumanasyaṃ kāyo na jahāti. antarāyāś ca na bhavanti. brahmacaryasya
SA01mkarmviu:365_3: alpāyāsena samādhim adhigacchati. uddiṣṭaṃ cāsya padavyañjanaṃ na naśyati. yathāśrutānāṃ
SA01mkarmviu:365_4: dharmāṇāṃ vistareṇārtham ājānati. ime daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya.
SA01mkarmviu:366: LXXIX. katame daśa guṇāḥ paiṇḍapātikatve. ucyate. caṅkramo 'sya upārjito bhavati. gocaro 'sya prahato bhavati. māno 'sya nihato (MKV 105)
SA01mkarmviu:367_0: bhavati. ātmānaṃ lābhena yojayati. parān puṇye pratiṣṭhāpayati. śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayati.
SA01mkarmviu:367_1: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhavati. sabrahmacāriṇām upaghātaḥ kṛto na bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:367_2: nīcacittam upasthāpitaṃ bhavati. piṇḍapātaparacittasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā diśo 'pratikūlā
SA01mkarmviu:367_3: bhavanti gamanāya. ime daśa guṇāḥ piṇḍapātikatve.
SA01mkarmviu:368_0: LXXX. daśa vaiśāradyāni. katamāni daśa. ucyate. viśārado grāmaṃ praviśati. viśārado
SA01mkarmviu:368_1: grāmān niṣkrāmati. viśāradaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte. viśāradaḥ pariṣadi dharmaṃ deśayati.
SA01mkarmviu:368_2: viśāradaḥ saṃghamadhyam avatarati. viśārada ācāryopādhyāyān upasaṃkrāmati. viśārado
SA01mkarmviu:368_4: paribhuṅkte. grāhyaṃ cāsya vaco bhavati. imāni daśa vaiśāradyāni.
